title: lta_diff
description: A tool to compute different distance norms for a single transform or for the difference between two transforms.

dist_type.title: Distance Type
dist_type.description: Distance type: 1 (Rigid Trans. Dist.), 2 (Affine Transform Distance), 3 (8-corners mean distance), 4 (Max Displacement), 5 (Determinant scaling), 6 (Interpolation Smoothing), 7 (Decomposition). Default is 2.

invert1.title: Invert First Transform
invert1.description: Invert first transform before computing difference matrix D

invert2.title: Invert Second Transform
invert2.description: Invert second transform before computing difference matrix D

vox.title: Vox Coordinates
vox.description: Compute distance in vox coordinates, after adjusting for voxel sizes. Default is RAS coordinates.

normdiv.title: Normalization Divisor
normdiv.description: Divide final distance by this value for step adjustment.

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: Radius in mm, used for RMS distance. Default is 100 to include the head.
